vibesExplanation: The video titled "Guided Hormesis Breathing: Reset Your Nervous System" strongly aligns with 'The Deep Recharge' vibe, scoring 0.85, due to its focus on resetting the nervous system through breathwork, indicating a calming and restorative experience.
